name: BEMANAGER - Fantasy Soccer
description:
BeManager is an online Soccer Manager where you compete with friends or against other users around the world to win the league. Sign the best players, prepare your team... and play depending on the performance of your players in real matches, you will get points. Compete gameweek after gameweek to become the champion. We have the best competitions:

• Premier League
• Champions and Europe League
• LaLiga
• Serie A
• Ligue 1
• Argentinian SuperLiga
• League MX & more

THE BEST USER-RATED FANTASY
The fantasy game best valued by users! Intuitive and with more features than any other soccer manager.

RIVALRIES GUARANTEED
Steal players from your rivals by paying their buyout clause. Protect your stars, so they don't get taken away. Excitement guaranteed!

LIVE THE MATCH IN REAL TIME
Possible lineups, injuries, goals, expulsions ... All the information you need to be the champion always updated. Don't miss a single detail!

THE BEST SOCCER COMMUNITY
Live football the way you always dreamed. Show everything you know about soccer by sharing your passion with the other soccer coaches of our community.

THE MOST COMPLETE AND TOTALLY FREE FANTASY
Personalize your competition as you want: market speeds, automatic bonus, salaries, barters, pools... everything free!

BRING YOUR FRIENDS TO BEMANAGER
Invite easily your friend through WhatsApp, Facebook or Twitter. The user who comes from other soccer fantasies, always stays with us.

5 SCORING SYSTEMS
Choose if you prefer scores by sports newspapers, or from performance statistics.

CHANGES DURING THE GAMEWEEK
Have you screwed up by picking an injured player? Bad scores? We give you the possibility of improving your team when the gameweek is at stake.

GOT A PROBLEM?
Password recovery? Failed purchase? Contact our support team at any time and they will immediately solve it: https://mister.mundodeportivo.com/contact
